node.title: Yes, Lord
node.description: It is often true that a person's resistance to complete surrender to God is due to his fear that he will suffer harm, loss, and pain as a result of His leading and providence. But Jeremiah paints a different picture of God. A God who is a potter with gentle hands. Earnestly desiring to reshape our lives into a beautiful vessel for His use, regardless of the shame and mistakes of our past.
